web_search_results.title: Weather Forecast and Weather Forecast Accuracy for Your City
key_points: ForecastAdvisor evaluates the accuracy of major weather forecasters including Accuweather and The Weather Channel.
Accuracy is calculated based on one- to three-day forecasts for high and low temperatures, as well as precipitation.
Temperature accuracy is defined as the percentage of forecasts within three degrees of the actual temperature.
Precipitation accuracy measures the percentage of correct forecasts for rain and snow.
Forecast data is collected daily in the evening for accuracy assessment.
web_search_results.raw_text:
<web doc>
[5]

Title: Weather Forecast and Weather Forecast Accuracy for Your City
Content: ### Forecast accuracy information

ForecastAdvisor will show you the accuracy of the major weather forecasters, including Accuweather, AerisWeather, Foreca, the National Weather Service, Open Weathermap, The Weather Channel, Weather Underground, Wetter, World Weather Online, and Weather News. We also provide links to your city's weather forecast from all the other weather forecasters, so you can compare for yourself.

  

### How we calculate accuracy

The overall accuracy percent is computed from the one- to three-day out accuracy percentages for high temperature, low temperature, icon forecast precipitation (both rain and snow), and text forecast precipitation (both rain and snow). Temperature accuracy is the percentage of forecasts within three degrees. Precipitation accuracy is the percentage of correct forecasts. The forecasts are collected in the evening each day.
</web doc>

Luka Doncic and Dereck Lively II are available for the Mavericks, while Olivier-Maxence Prosper is ruled out.
Timberwolves' starting point guard Mike Conley is listed as questionable for the game.
The Mavericks lead the series 3-1 and can advance to the NBA Finals with a victory.

The winner of the series will face the Boston Celtics, who swept the Indiana Pacers in the Eastern Conference finals.

Dallas Mavericks And Minnesota Timberwolves Game 5 Injury Reports
=================================================================

The Dallas Mavericks and Minnesota Timberwolves have announced their injury reports for Game 5.

####  | May 30, 2024

!

May 28, 2024; Dallas, Texas, USA; Minnesota Timberwolves guard Anthony Edwards (5) and guard Mike Conley (10) speak during the second quarter against the Dallas Mavericks in game four of the western conference finals for the 2024 NBA playoffs at American Airlines Center. Mandatory Credit: Kevin Jairaj-USA TODAY Sports / Kevin Jairaj-USA TODAY Sports



* * *

**: Luka Doncic, Mike Conley and Dereck Lively II are available.**

On Thursday evening, the Dallas Mavericks and Minnesota Timberwolves will play Game 5 of the Western Conference finals at the Target Center.

For the game, both teams have announced their injury reports (updated as of 2:30 Eastern Time).

The Mavs have listed Luka Doncic and Dereck Lively II as questionable, while Olivier-Maxence Prosper has been ruled out.

Meanwhile, the Timberwolves have listed starting point guard Mike Conley as questionable.

!

NBA Injury Report / Mavs-Timberwolves

The Mavs have a 3-1 lead in the series, so they can advance to the 2024 NBA Finals with a victory.

If the Timberwolves stay alive, Game 6 would be back in Dallas on Saturday evening.

Most recently, the Timberwolves won Game 4 (on the road) by a score of 105-100.

All-Star guard Anthony Edwards led the way with 29 points, ten rebounds and nine assists while shooting 11/25 from the field and 2/5 from the three-point range in 40 minutes of playing time.

!

May 28, 2024; Dallas, Texas, USA; Minnesota Timberwolves guard Anthony Edwards (5) speaks to Dallas Mavericks guard Luka Doncic (77) during the fourth quarter during game four of the western conference finals for the 2024 NBA playoffs at American Airlines Center. Mandatory Credit: Kevin Jairaj-USA TODAY Sports / Kevin Jairaj-USA TODAY Sports

Whoever wins the series will face off against Jayson Tatum and the Boston Celtics in the Finals.

The Celtics swept the Indiana Pacers in the Eastern Conference finals.

Game 1 of the series will be on June 6 in Boston, so the Celtics will be more rested than either the Timberwolves or the Mavs.

!

May 28, 2024; Dallas, Texas, USA; Minnesota Timberwolves guard Anthony Edwards (5) speaks to Dallas Mavericks guard Luka Doncic (77) during the fourth quarter of game four of the western conference finals for the 2024 NBA playoffs at American Airlines Center. Mandatory Credit: Kevin Jairaj-USA TODAY Sports / Kevin Jairaj-USA TODAY Sports

The Mavs are the fifth seed and beat the Los Angeles Clippers and Oklahoma City Thunder in the first two rounds.

As for the Timberwolves, they are the third seed and defeated the Phoenix Suns and the Denver Nuggets in the first two rounds.

* * *

Published May 30, 2024|Modified May 30, 2024

!

Luka Doncic and Mike Conley are available for their respective teams, with Doncic listed as questionable.
The Timberwolves have only Mike Conley listed as questionable; no other players are on their injury report.

key_points: The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves in the 2024 NBA Western Conference Finals with a series score of 4-1.
Game 1: Mavericks won 108-105; Luka Dončić scored 33 points.
Game 2: Mavericks won 109-108; Luka Dončić scored 32 points.
Game 3: Timberwolves lost 107-116; K. Towns scored 33 points.
Game 4: Timberwolves won 105-100; A. Edwards scored 29 points.
Game 5: Mavericks won 124-103; K. Towns scored 36 points.
The Mavericks had a 120.5 offensive rating and a 111.4 defensive rating throughout the series.

web_search_results.title: Game Stats: Mavericks vs. Timberwolves, 110-118 in the 2024 NBA Regular Season
key_points: The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Dallas Mavericks with a final score of 118-110 on December 28, 2023.
Scoring by period: Mavericks scored 26, 30, 35, and 19 points in the four quarters, while the Timberwolves scored 37, 24, 37, and 20 points.
Anthony Edwards led the Timberwolves with 44 points, while Tim Hardaway Jr. scored 32 points for the Mavericks.
Rudy Gobert contributed significantly for the Timberwolves with 20 points and 11 rebounds.
The Timberwolves shot 51.4% from the field, while the Mavericks shot 44.4%.
The game featured notable performances from both teams, with multiple players contributing in points, rebounds, and assists.

web_search_results.title: Game Stats: Timberwolves vs. Mavericks, 108-115 in the 2024 NBA Regular Season
key_points: The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves with a score of 115 to 108 on January 7, 2024.
Scoring by period: Timberwolves scored 29, 27, 26, and 26 points; Mavericks scored 30, 30, 31, and 24 points.
Anthony Edwards led the Timberwolves with 36 points and 17 rebounds, while Kyrie Irving led the Mavericks with 35 points.
Mike Conley contributed 7 assists for the Timberwolves, and Luka Doncic had 8 assists for the Mavericks.
The Timberwolves shot 43.6% from the field, while the Mavericks shot 45.3%.

web_search_results.title: Mavericks 108-105 Timberwolves (May 22, 2024) Box Score - ESPN
key_points: The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves 108-105 in Game 1 on May 22, 2024.
Luka Doncic led the Mavericks with 33 points, while Kyrie Irving contributed 30 points.
The Timberwolves were led by Karl-Anthony Towns with 16 points and Anthony Edwards with 19 points.
The Mavericks shot 49.4% from the field, while the Timberwolves shot 42.7%.
Mavericks' free throw shooting was strong at 94.1%, compared to the Timberwolves' 61.1%.
Attendance for the game was 19,433 at Target Center in Minneapolis.

summary: The Minnesota Timberwolves, with a 2-1 record in the early NBA season, are set to face the Dallas Mavericks, who have recently struggled. The Mavericks lost their most recent game against the Phoenix Suns. The Timberwolves have made roster adjustments by sending Leonard Miller and others to their G League affiliate. Expectations are high for the Timberwolves' Anthony Edwards and Julius Randle, who have been leading the team in scoring. Dallas' Luka Doncic has been performing at a high level despite the team's overall challenges.

key_people.name: Anthony Edwards
key_people.role: Minnesota Timberwolves guard, leading the team with strong offensive performances

key_people.name: Julius Randle
key_people.role: Minnesota Timberwolves forward, significant contributor to the scoring, previously with efforts of 24 points

key_people.name: Luka Doncic
key_people.role: Dallas Mavericks guard, the team's scoring leader with exceptional individual performances

key_facets: Timberwolves' current 2-1 season record indicates early success.
Timberwolves have made roster changes, bolstering their rotation.
Mavericks' recent loss to Phoenix may affect their morale.
Luka Doncic’s ability to influence the game as Dallas' central playmaker.
Anthony Edwards and Julius Randle are pivotal for Timberwolves.
reconciled_information: While the Mavericks have a star in Luka Doncic, their overall performance has been lacking recently, especially in their loss against the Suns. The Timberwolves, conversely, are showing momentum early in the season. The betting odds reflect confidence in the Timberwolves, given their stronger start. Edwards' and Randle's current forms contribute significantly.
unique_information: This game marks the Mavericks' attempt to bounce back from a challenging recent performance, while the Timberwolves are adjusting with new roster decisions. Anthony Edwards' milestone reflects his capability to lead the Timberwolves in critical moments.
descriptive_title: Timberwolves Poised to Capitalize at Home Against Mavericks
fantasy_tip: Start Anthony Edwards, as he's likely to have valuable point contributions and potential high scores.
interesting_statistic: Anthony Edwards has reached 800 career threes at a record pace, tying Steph Curry, signaling his escalating threat from beyond the arc.
unique_prediction: Anthony Edwards will score over 35 points, showcasing his offensive prowess against the Mavericks.
high_or_low_score: Likely to be a close game with moderate scoring; possibility of Timberwolves covering the spread but not decisively.
